mapper.insert: insert into music (music_no, music_title, music_artist, music_album, music_play, release_time) values(music_seq.nextval, #{musicTitle}, #{musicArtist}, #{musicAlbum}, 0, sysdate)
mapper.update: update music set music_title=#{musicTitle}, music_artist=#{musicArtist}, music_album=#{musicAlbum} where music_no = #{musicNo}
